#summary Superior Colliculus
@@[Home] -> [BiologicalLifeResearch] -> [BrainAreaMBA] -> [BrainRegionMBA_MM_SC]
----

This page covers biological details of component Superior Colliculus.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Midbrain Mesencephalon -> Superior Colliculus (MBA.MM.SC) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaMBA Motor Brainstem Area]
  * *Function*: Direct behavioral responses toward specific points in egocentric space, induce saccadic eye movement
  * *Notes to function*: Superficial layers are sensory-related, deep layers are motor-related
